Manual detachment of flight plan to track

value.dsc: Transponder Ground bit not set or unknown

Track service begin (i.e. first message transmitted to the user for the track)

Track not resulting from amalgamation process
SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)
ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information
